document_data.name: Negative Energy Protection
document_data.mainbody: '''''Negative energy protection''''' was a [[armor quality|quality]] that could be applied to [[armor]].
document_data.Powers: The wearer of ''negative energy protection armor'' was granted the effects of the ''[[negative energy protection]]'' spell once per day for a period of around thirty seconds. This ability triggered the first occasion each day when they were struck by any form of [[negative energy]].
document_data.Creation: Fittingly, the spell ''negative energy protection'' was used when bestowing this quality upon a suit of armor.
